attributes.action: Any company avoiding tax should not be allowed to donate to any Political Party
attributes.background: It seems bizarre that a company who does not up hold British law in terms of what they do to avoid tax has influence over a Political Party in terms of donations. We want as clean a political system as possible

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you would like companies which have been found to be avoiding tax, evading tax, or both, to be banned from making donations to political parties.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
